title: What's going on with Challenger Ahri?
body:
Hey everyone,
Any idea what's going on with Challenger {{champion:103}} ?
When I first looked at the skin sale list for the Snowdown event, I saw Challenger {{champion:103}}  right up near the top. I came back later and she wasn't there, so I scrolled to the comments where someone quoted a Riot staff member who said that adding her to the list was an accident. Apparently, she wasn't supposed to be available till the next eSports season, and to make up for it, she would be available at 50% off at the 2016 season.
Because of this, I decided not to buy Riot Points until Challenger {{champion:103}} goes on sale later. Now, according to the store, she's on sale for less than 48 hours and I won't be able to buy RP until after the sale is over. Does anyone know whether she will be on sale again this spring or not?
Thanks!
-ntm1999 (Nathaniel)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: We made a post last night about the reasoning behind this decision [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/uQERzEsh-challenger-ahri-storms-back-into-snowdown) if you'd like more info! :]
Ah, I see it now! Thank you so much for the info, this clears everything up.
Riot stated it was an accident--a typo. They didn't mean to include it in the list at this time.
Yes, but the confusing part is that they also said that she would not be in the Snowdown Sale - but she is. Does this mean she won't be on sale this spring when they said she would?
